{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Smart Home Hub |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.wink.com/products/wink-hub/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Wink_Hub |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Wink |model = Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = PWHUB-WH01 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = IoT hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ACAJ-WINK22 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale;i.MX28;MCIMX283DVM4B; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = (ARM926J) |cpu1spd = 454<!-- 350 / 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G1; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16EG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.01-14400;gda781c6-dirty; |stockos = Linux;2.6.35.3;flex-dvt;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth, Z-Wave, ZigBee, Kidde, Lutron |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16881679003 |asin = B002YVHYF2 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00PV6GAI4 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43362; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://community.smartthings.com/t/wink-hub-teardown/3288 ''Teardown Wink Hub'' on '''SmartThings'''] :CPU: [[Freescale]] i.MX28 @454MHz (ARM926EJ-S) :Flash: 128MB (NAND), RAM: 64MB (DRAM) :Wi-Fi/BT: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) [[BCM]]? (chip with markings "5408E3 E423B1") :Kidde (433MHz): PIC16F883 Microcontroller w/ TI CC1101 RF Transceiver :Lutron (433MHz): STM32L100R8 (ARM Cortex M3 @32MHz w/ 64Kb Flash) ::w/ same TI CC1101 RF Transceiver :Zigbee: ''Ember'' EM3587 (ARM Cortex M3 SoC w/ 192Kb Flash/12Kb RAM) :Z-Wave: ''[[Sigma Designs]]'' SD3502A :Ethernet: Part of PCB layout but not populated *[https://web.archive.org/web/20180830233420/http://jalderman.org/?p=318 ''Wink Hub â€“ Rooting via JTAG'' on '''Jalderman.org'''] :CPU: MCIMX283DVM4B ([http://free-electrons.com/~maxime/pub/datasheet/MCIMX28RM.pdf i.MX28]) @454MHz (ARMv5TEJ) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU32M16EG-AC (64MB)
===Forum threads=== *[https://forums.anandtech.com/threads/the-wink-home-automation-thread.2390152/ ''Wink home automation'' on '''AnandTech''' forums] *[http://www.rootwink.com/viewtopic.php?t=67 ''Rooting ANY firmware level'' on '''RootWink''' forums] ([https://pastebin.com/UVLREnut Boot log])
